subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Anti-patterns
msgSnippet: ... Did I?  Must have been the JavaCC part... racy stuff, those parser generators.... Yours, Tom
messageBody:
On Thu, 2006-02-23 at 22:42 +0000, Andrew McDonagh wrote:
> Tom Copeland wrote:
> >No problemo! Hopefully we'll be able to put together some appropriate
> >checks for JUnit 4 annotation-based tests... should be doable since the
> >latest JavaCC grammar parses out annotations into a nice abstract syntax
> >tree. Onwards and upwards!
> no need for talking pornographic Tom...
>
> ;-)

Did I? Must have been the JavaCC part... racy stuff, those parser
generators....

Yours,

Tom
